original_text: In the vision, he took me to the land of Israel. He put me on a very high mountain. When I looked towards the south, I saw a group of buildings that looked like a city.
korean_text: 하나님의 이상 중에 나를 데리고 이스라엘 땅에 이르러 나를 매우 높은 산 위에 내려놓으시는데 거기에서 남으로 향하여 성읍 형상 같은 것이 있더라

sentences.original_text: he took me to the land of Israel
He put me on a very high mountain
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 나를 매우 높은 산 위에 세웠다

sentences.original_text: When I looked towards the south
I saw a group of buildings
